sn22.26:1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn22.26:1.3: ‘ko nu kho rupassa assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
sn22.26:1.4: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
sn22.26:1.5: Ko sannaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
sn22.26:1.6: Ko sankharanam assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
sn22.26:1.7: Ko vinnanassa assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
sn22.26:1.9: ‘yam kho rupam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam rupassa assado.
sn22.26:1.10: Yam rupam aniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, ayam rupassa adinavo.
sn22.26:1.11: Yo rupasmim chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam rupassa nissaranam.
sn22.26:1.12: Yam vedanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vedanaya assado.
sn22.26:1.13: Yam vedana anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam vedanaya adinavo.
sn22.26:1.14: Yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vedanaya nissaranam.
sn22.26:1.16: yam sankhare paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam sankharanam assado.
sn22.26:1.17: Yam sankhara anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam sankharanam adinavo.
sn22.26:1.18: Yo sankharesu chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam sankharanam nissaranam.
sn22.26:1.19: Yam vinnanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vinnanassa assado.
sn22.26:1.20: Yam vinnanam aniccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, ayam vinnanassa adinavo.
sn22.26:1.21: Yo vinnanasmim chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vinnanassa nissaranam’.
sn22.26:2.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
sn22.26:2.2: Yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim;
sn22.26:2.3: athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
sn22.26:2.5: ‘akuppa me vimutti; ayamantima jati; natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
